phrase: Под южно дърво, цъфтящо в синьо, бягаше малко пухкаво зайче.
translation: А little fluffy young rabbit ran under a southern tree blooming in blue

translation: The view is infinitely wide. There is blue sky outside the window.[9]

translation: The breeze sees the guest in. Soft voice accompanies the tea.[10]

phrase: Quizdeltagerne spiste jordbær med fløde, mens cirkusklovnen Walther spillede på xylofon.
translation: The quiz contestants ate strawberries with cream while Walther the clown was playing the xylophone.

phrase: Pa’s wijze lynx bezag vroom het fikse aquaduct.
translation: Dad’s wise lynx piously regarded the substantial aqueduct.

translation: Change of echo every Thursday.

phrase: See väike mölder jõuab rongile hüpata
translation: This small miller is able to jump to train

phrase: Viekas kettu punaturkki laiskan koiran takaa kurkki.
translation: The cunning red-coated fox peeped from behind the lazy dog.

phrase: Voix ambiguë d’un cœur qui au zéphyr préfère les jattes de kiwis.
translation: Ambiguous voice of a heart which prefers dishes of kiwis in the breeze [used in Windows XP]

phrase: Portez ce vieux whisky au juge blond qui fume.
translation: Bring this old whisky to the blond smoking judge.

phrase: Zwölf Boxkämpfer jagen Viktor quer über den großen Sylter Deich
translation: Twelve boxing fighters drive Viktor over the great Sylt Dike

phrase: Franz jagt im komplett verwahrlosten Taxi quer durch Bayern.
translation: Franz drives all across Bavaria in a totally run-down taxi.

phrase: Θέλει αρετή και τόλμη η ελευθερία. (Ανδρέας Κάλβος)
translation: Liberty requires virtue and mettle. (Andreas Kalvos)

phrase: Ο καλύμνιος σφουγγαράς ψιθύρισε πως θα βουτήξει χωρίς να διστάζει.
translation: The Calymnian spongeman whispered that he’ll dive without hesitating.

phrase: דג סקרן שט לו בים זך אך לפתע פגש חבורה נחמדה שצצה כך.
translation: A curious fish sailed a clear sea, and suddenly found nice company that just popped up.
usesAllLetters: yes, but with no distinction between regular and final forms.

phrase: Árvíztűrő tükörfúrógép
translation: Flood-resistant mirror drill

phrase: Egy hűtlen vejét fülöncsípő, dühös mexikói úr Wesselényinél mázol Quitóban.
translation: An angry Mexican man, who caught his faithless son-in-law, is painting Wesselényi’s house in Quito.
usesAllLetters: without digraphs, which are considered letters of their own

phrase: Svo hölt, yxna kýr þegði jú um dóp í fé á bæ
translation: A cow in heat with such a limp would admittedly keep silent about drugs in sheep on a farm.

phrase: Þú dazt á hnéð í vök og yfir blóm sexý pæju
translation: You fell on the knee in a hole in the ice and over a sexy girl’s flower.
usesAllLetters: each letter exactly once, with z (obsolete spelling)

phrase: Saya lihat foto Hamengkubuwono XV bersama enam zebra purba cantik yang jatuh dari Al Quranmu.
translation: I saw a photo of Hamengkubuwono XV along with six beautiful ancient Zebra which fell from your Al Quran

phrase: Ma la volpe, col suo balzo, ha raggiunto il quieto Fido.
translation: But the fox, with its jump, reached the calm dog

phrase: いろはにほへと ちりぬるを わかよたれそ つねならむ うゐのおくやま けふこえて あさきゆめみし ゑひもせす
translation: Even the blossoming flowers / Will eventually scatter / Who in this world / is unchanging? / The deep mountains of vanity- / We cross them today / And we shall not see superficial dreams / Nor be deluded. (from Iroha-uta)

phrase: 다람쥐 헌 쳇바퀴에 타고파
translation: (I) Wanna ride on the chipmunk’s old hamster wheel. or Because Hamster want to ride on old Hamster wheel…
usesAllLetters: uses all consonants but not all vowels

phrase: Sarkanās jūrascūciņas peld pa jūru.
translation: Red seapigs swim in the sea.

phrase: En god stil må først og fremst være klar. Den må være passende. Aristoteles.
translation: A good essay must first and foremost be clear. It must be appropriate. Aristotle.

phrase: Pchnąć w tę łódź jeża lub ośm skrzyń fig
translation: Push into this boat a hedgehog or eight boxes of figs.

phrase: A rápida raposa castanha salta por cima do cão lento.
translation: The quick brown fox jumps over the slow dog.

phrase: A ligeira raposa marrom ataca o cão preguiçoso.
translation: The quick brown fox attacks the lazy dog.

phrase: Zebras caolhas de Java querem passar fax para moças gigantes de New York
translation: Strabic zebras from Java want to pass a fax to giant girls from New York.

phrase: Agera vulpe maronie sare peste câinele cel leneş.
translation: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

phrase: Съешь ещё этих мягких французских булок да выпей же чаю
translation: Eat some more of these soft French buns and drink some tea [used in Windows XP]

phrase: Чешће цeђење мрeжастим џаком побољшава фертилизацију генских хибрида.
translation: More frequent filtering through the reticular bag improves fertilization of genetic hybrids.

phrase: Češće ceđenje mrežastim džakom poboljšava fertilizaciju genskih hibrida.
translation: More frequent filtering through the reticular bag improves fertilization of genetic hybrids.

phrase: Kŕdeľ šťastných ďatľov učí pri ústí Váhu mĺkveho koňa obhrýzať kôru a žrať čerstvé mäso.
translation: A flock of happy woodpeckers by the mouth of the river Vah is teaching a silent horse to nibble on bark and feed on fresh meat. (Modified sentence which contains all accents and diacritics.)
usesAllLetters: except unaccented Y, C (as distinct from part of the digraph and separate letter CH), J, unaccented L, and the foreign letters F, G, Ó, Q, W, X

phrase: V kožuščku hudobnega fanta stopiclja mizar in kliče 0619872345.
translation: A cabinetmaker steps lightly through a malicious boy fur coat and calls 0619872345.

phrase: El veloz murciélago hindú comía feliz cardillo y kiwi. La cigüeña tocaba el saxofón detrás del palenque de paja.
translation: The quick Hindu bat was happily eating thistle and kiwi. The stork played the saxophone behind the straw palisade.

phrase: Flygande bäckasiner söka hwila på mjuka tuvor
translation: Flying snipes soon look to rest on soft grass beds (with obsolete Swedish spelling and grammar)

phrase:
เป็นมนุษย์สุดประเสริฐเลิศคุณค่า
					กว่าบรรดาฝูงสัตว์เดรัจฉาน
					จงฝ่าฟันพัฒนาวิชาการ อย่าล้างผลาญฤๅเข่นฆ่าบีฑาใคร
					ไม่ถือโทษโกรธแช่งซัดฮึดฮัดด่า
					หัดอภัยเหมือนกีฬาอัชฌาสัย
					ปฏิบัติประพฤติกฎกำหนดใจ
				พูดจาให้จ๊ะ ๆ จ๋า ๆ น่าฟังเอยฯ
translation:
Being a man is worthy
						Beyond senseless animal
						Begin educate thyself
						Begone from killing and trouble
						Bear not thy grudge, damn and, curse
						Bestow forgiving and sporting
						Befit with rules
						Benign speech speak thou

phrase: Pijamalı hasta, yağız şoföre çabucak güvendi
translation: Patient with pajamas, trusted swarthy driver quickly

phrase: زۆھرەگۈل ئابدۇۋاجىت فرانسىيەنىڭ پارىژدىكى خېلى بىشەم ئوقۇغۇچى.
translation: Those two roosters were not able to move to the mountain near Paris in France.

phrase: ئاۋۇ بىر جۈپ خوراز فرانسىيەنىڭ پارىژ شەھرىگە يېقىن تاغقا كۆچەلمىدى.
translation: Zöhregül Abduwajit is a quite unpleasant student in Paris, France.
